name: Hot Dog's Home
description:
This is a great, puzzle based food maker challenge game. You need to serve the customers with various items. You need to create a Hot Dog from the ingredient what visible in the right side on the customer window ( from top to bottom). If the customer like, you need to give drink also, from the 3 different drink. In the left side of the customer display you see the angry bar, where you see how much wait for the Hot Dog. If the customer angry, you can give a candy drink for better mood.
40 more and more difficult levels, Gamecenter support for the earned money.
Have a fun, enjoy the game and the Hot Dog!
